metadata.Title: CVE-2022-34480 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Free of uninitialized pointer in lg_init

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-34480` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 102.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
firefox-geckodriver - 102.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 102.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
No subscription required

libnss3 - 2:3.68-1ubuntu1.2
libnss3-tools - 2:3.68-1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 22.04, the firefox package is just a script that installs the Firefox snap

criterions.comment: firefox package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '102.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.1').
nss package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:3.68-1ubuntu1.2').
thunderbird package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
